== Introduction ==

These release notes for '''Kubuntu 17.04''' (Zesty Zapus) provide an overview of the release and document the known issues with '''Kubuntu 17.04'''.

=== Support lifespan ===

Kubuntu 17.04 will be supported for 9 months.

== Plasma 5.9 - Designed to be a Breeze, Plasma 5 is simple by default, powerful when needed ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:kubuntu17.04beta2l.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| '''Plasma 5''', the new generation of KDE's desktop has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup. <<BR>><<BR>> <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/plasma-5.9.0.php|Version 5.9 - the ninth set of updates to Plasma 5]]</nowiki> is the default in this release of Kubuntu. <<BR>><<BR>> Folder view is now the default setting for the Plasma Desktop for new installations and new user accounts.
|}

== Other release highlights ==

* KDE Frameworks 5.31
* Calligra Office Suite updated to Qt/KF5 version 3.0.1
* Krita latest bugfix release - after this popular and advanced digital painting application was split from Calligra.
* K3B updated to a Qt5/KF5 preview snapshot of the upcoming release from KDE Applications 17.04.
* Okular PDF and document reader is now Qt/KF5 in applications 16.12
* Kdevelop is now the most recent bugfix release of the 5.0.x series.
* Numerous application and translation updates from KDE.

=== Getting KDE PIM 16.12.3 packages from backports PPAs ===

We missed by a whisker getting updated PIM 16.12.3 (kontact, kmail, akregator, kgpg etc..) into Zesty for release day, and we believe it is important that our users have access to this significant update.

Therefore packages for PIM 16.12.3 release are now available in the Kubuntu backports PPAs.

Instructions for installing and installation options can be found in the announcement on our main webiste:

<nowiki>[[http://kubuntu.org/news/kde-pim-update-now-available-for-zesty-zapus-17-04/|KDE PIM update now available for Zesty Zapus 17.04]]</nowiki>

Please read the announcement carefully before installing.
